info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 12 at 9:37PM EDT until August 13 at 12:00AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 PM EDT FOR CENTRAL FAIRFIELD AND WESTERN NEW HAVEN COUNTIES... At 937 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over New Haven, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Bridgeport, New Haven, Waterbury, Milford, Shelton, Naugatuck, Southbury, Wolcott, Newtown, Fairfield, Hamden, Stratford, Trumbull, Cheshire, and Ridgefield. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
